title: AI Image/Video Editor - Youtube
job_overview:
About the Role
Join our creative team to enhance and transform pre-edited base videos. You’ll generate a burst of AI images for powerful hooks, apply polished edits in CapCut Pro, and run final quality checks before upload.

Key Responsibilities

1)Create 10–15 high-impact AI images for each video’s opening hook using GPT Image Gen (I will provide a chatgpt plus account)

2)Edit and refine videos in CapCut Pro by adding basic effects

3)Sync visuals to audio.

Perform final QC: image relevance/content policy checks etc;

Deliver finished MP4s and neatly organized source assets on deadline.
